articles.description: The Duchy of Cornwall has passed down from King Charles III to Prince William, who will now become landlord of his father's beloved Cotswold residence Highgrove House
articles.content:
Prince William has taken over a £345 million property portfolio from the King - and will become his father's landlord as a result. 
The Prince of Wales will net around £700,000 a year from King Char… [+2174 chars]
